tool_description: Aircraft Scatter API by ADSBexchange.com provides real-time data on aircraft flying above 10,000 feet within a specified radius.

api_list.name: Aircraft Scatter Data
api_list.description: Returns all aircraft above 10,000 feet within 1000 kilometres from specified latitude and longitude.

required_parameters.name: lat
required_parameters.description: The latitude coordinate for the location to query.

required_parameters.name: lon
required_parameters.description: The longitude coordinate for the location to query.
